evaluation 594 475 114 598 357 599 retrieval 358 limitations 10 18 1230 120 484 1 243 123 2 244 3 124 245 4 127 deals science 128 7 129 925 students 492 493 search 376 135 1357 378 1356 systems are 814 31 817 a manager 1374 i 1373 1372 services 1370 the 385 145 1368 t 1004 820 w increasing 1364 x 702 823 information 703 to 825 705 826 947 827 948 828 708 1143 1264 1263 1383 394 274 1017 1257 1377 1376 1375 programming bibliographic this 1396 1392 1390 289 169 1146 602 603 604 61 726 606 727 728 609 some rather book for aspects 291 1284 we primarily 175 fw 730 972 610 731 611 732 1035 612 733 734 736 738 739 characteristics capabilities 1297 with 740 741 621 742 743 744 1045 625 505 626 time attempted 627 508 190 191 hope 197 990 630 511 1058 512 633 754 755 broad 514 635 877 636 637 879 518 hardware viewpoint 1198 is it 1073 toward 520 883 provide 400 642 643 885 523 524 525 646 526 527 648 appearing 529 1080 our literature 650 530 library 532 534 1078 have planner 1091 may intellectual 1402 304 546 1089 305 306 548 307 1405 subject use that 1414 553 312 433 than emphasis from lancaster all new 320 321 1303 survey present oriented 450 692 330 451 452 211 575 696 214 and 699 of design 458 579 459 218 value on or rapidly 1327 1448 345 225 468 online 1207
